stories.text:
I see some worrying signs of things going toward the internet isolation. Some countries embrace the model of China. Russia is one step from testing the "Deep packet inspection". Google filters the results per region, which is not a big deal, but could be really annoying sometimes.
And some countries take advantage of COVID to  streighten the control over the people, like Australia. What are your thoughs?
stories.title: Will the rest of the world embrace the internet model of China with time?
PRayGround: GPU ray tracing framework using Nvidia OptiX 7

stories.text: I am leaving Hacker News. I submitted a Youtube video where a doctor discussed the potential for intravenous injection of an mRNA based vaccine to cause heart issues in mice. The technique that the doctor advocated was to check to see if the needle hit a vein. dang banned it. I am done with censorship on this site. Good bye.
stories.title: Good Bye
